name: CafePedia v1
description:
"The Game Just Prototype create using Flash"

This game is only available in Indonesian.

This game was made to fulfill one of the course assignments in 2019. I developed this game with my group of 5 people and also collaborated with 1 architect student.

CafePedia is basically an educational game for children aged 5 years and over, which will introduce food and drinks or dessert. CafePedia uses the approach of reading, counting and arranging words from the dessert it displays.

Partially used assets are created by team members as well as collaborating partners.

Developer Team:

  • ThymeSeyU as Project Manager and Game Designer.
  • Ivan Nurachman as 3D Designer for Cafe Background. (Screenshot 1 & 2).
  • Rifqi Nauval as Programmer.
  • Egy Imaldi Sulistyo as Writer Dialogue and Character.
  • Ananda Andika as Material Collecting.
  • M Walid NF as 2D Artist and Storyboard.

As for other assets:

  1. Some vector images using assets from Freepik.
  2. The icon used comes from Iconfinder.
  3. The music used comes from OpenGameArt.

If there are sources of assets not included, you can be submitted via the comments so that I can add them in the future.

- Thanks...
